Description: Relationship between whether a language has numeral classifiers and whether semantic adjectives occur closer to the noun than the numeral when both occur on the same side of the noun

Name: Numeral classifiers and noun-based position of numerals and adjectives
Description: Relationship between whether the language has numeral classifiers and whether numeral and adjective occur on the same side of the noun
